title: mahAgaNapatim vandE
sahitya:
mahAgaNapatim vandE mAdhavAdyamara brndam


anupallavi

 ahantAdi rahitam shakti vihitam Ananda dantam Ekadantam


caraNam   tripura vadArttham shivEna tryambakEnArccitam upaniSad pratipAditam 
umAmahEshvara sutam kapila vasiSThAdi natam kanjajAdi bhirIDitam kapilam 
krSNa pUjitam karivadanEna shObhitam suparNavAha sEvitam sura guruguha 
bhAvitam kapitthAmra panasa jambU kadaLIphala bhakSitam
